SummaryEnglish: Mitsuki Ikuta works for the Hōchiku Corporation, making movies. To all who know her, she is perceived as being a very infantile woman, still wearing childish fashions. A fan of the detective movie genre, she suddenly finds herself chosen to be the main producer of a new film—but it's a "hero movie" (a genre generally considered childish). Determined to succeed, regardless, she takes on the job.

1.SummaryEnglish: Mizuki has seriously made up her mind to become the PD of Kos. But she feels that the staff and cast still take her lightly. She can't go on like this! So she starts taking action to become an adult woman. Next to the 'Pants for Babes' plan, she gets her first breast augmentation massage with the aim of getting rid of her babes' body shape!　Mizuki feels uneasy about having her breasts rubbed by a stranger, but through the masseuse's skillful technique, she realises the joy of having her mature body developed, albeit only a little ♥.

2.SummaryEnglish: When asked by Hayakawa to add more sexy shots to the "cos", Mizuki strongly disagrees, but is pushed aside, saying that it is to increase viewer ratings. As a result, the scene in which Scarlett trains the ancient capital, which has been defeated by Yao's men, was filmed in a bath towel because the scene was set in a hot spring. Mizuki tries to stop her, but the situation accelerates in an unexpected direction...!

3.SummaryEnglish: Mizuki came to a regional location to film an episode of Dian and Rabian Layer's Black Prayer Warrior confrontation. Suddenly, Hayakawa arrives, whom she has not invited. Hayakawa gets drunk and sloppy at a big party at the hotel where the tie-up took place. Mizuki has no choice but to take her to her room, but Sayaka and Miku tell her that she can switch rooms with them. However, Hayakawa's true nature is revealed (?) and she falls prey to his venom. Hayakawa's poisonous fangs catch up with her, and Mizuki is forced to take off her yukata..!

4.SummaryEnglish: A few weeks after the filming of "Super Transformation Cos ∞ Player" was completed. Oizumi completes a complete version of the making-of video and goes to Mizuki's house to give it to her, but Mizuki is not there. But Mizuki is not there, nor is she at the Takarazake film studio, which is in the middle of preparations for the filming of a new programme, "Galactic Transformation Galvan", which starts in April. I went to TV Taiyo, m.o.e. and the Hochiku head office, but could not see her. When they returned to the studio again, Mizuki, who thought she had finally met him, suddenly made a big announcement to the assembled crowd!

1.SummaryEnglish: Mizuki Ikuta is a 25-year-old office worker in her third year at Takarazake. One day, Kurume, a senior producer, shouts at her: 'You're going to be in charge of the new programme "Super Transformation Cos ∞ Player"! and her everyday life until then changes drastically.

2.SummaryEnglish: After reading the script for the first episode of Super Transformation Cos ∞ Player, Mizuki was shocked to find that the content was completely different from the proposal. She immediately consults her boss, Umemiya, but he won't take her up on it, and then she receives a complaint from the 'real original author'.

3.SummaryEnglish: Finally, the filming of the "Super Transformation Cos ∞ Player" began. But Mizuki, feeling neglected by the staff as usual, says: 'Today is the day I'll make them recognise me as an adult woman!' and encouraged them to wear the suits she had just bought.

4.SummaryEnglish: After receiving a request from Hayakawa to have a handsome man on the show, Mizuki decides to have a beautiful young man from the armour of the enemy character, Black Prayer. In fact, she has held up the schedule of former idol and racer, Toshihide Nagasaka...

6.SummaryEnglish: Today she would meet the man of her dreams, and her brother would bring his fiancée from New York. With these thoughts in mind, Mizuki was excited from morning. Furthermore, when she goes to visit Director Sato, she hears a very happy story...
